meanings.definition: Able to be discussed or debated.
meanings.sent1: The topic was very discussible among the students.
meanings.sent2: It is important to have discussible issues in a classroom setting.
meanings.sent3: The discussible nature of the topic led to a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were as discussible as a hot potato.
meanings.sent5: The concept of freedom is highly discussible in a democratic society.

meanings.sent1: The proposal was discussible during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: In a healthy relationship, all matters should be discussible.
meanings.sent3: The discussible nature of the decision made everyone think twice.
meanings.sent4: The issue of climate change is as discussible as the weather itself.
meanings.sent5: His actions were so discussible that they sparked a heated argument.
